chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the above problem:

Hello. I'm afraid I didn't notice in time that the email address provided is not correct. Therefore, I haven't received an invoice or confirmation of my order.
Please send the necessary documents to the following email address: steinert-timo@gmx.de
Best regards,
Timo Steinert
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

the customer has requested the invoice for this order. While we wait for it, I have sent the proof of payment.

Can you please provide the invoice in the next 48 hours so we can send it to the customer?

As a reminder, if the invoice is not sent within 48 business hours following this request, we will have to make a goodwill gesture of 20% of the amount of the order (including tax but excluding shipping costs) within a maximum of €50.

We look forward to hearing back from you.

Thanks for your continued partnership and support.

Regards,
Tania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
